instructions.title: How to use GIF to PDF Converter

steps.title: Upload GIF images
steps.description: Drag and drop multiple GIF images into the upload area, or click to browse and select files from your computer. For animated GIFs, the first frame will be used in the PDF.

steps.title: Reorder your GIF images
steps.description: Use the up/down arrow buttons to rearrange GIF images in your desired order. The sequence determines how pages will appear in the final PDF document.

steps.title: Configure PDF settings
steps.description: Click the settings icon to choose page size (A4, Letter, A3, Legal, Tabloid, Custom), image fit mode (contain, cover, fill, none), margins (0-100pt), and output filename.

steps.title: Generate and download PDF
steps.description: Click Generate PDF to create your document. Once processing completes, download the PDF file to your device. Each GIF image becomes one page in the final PDF.
